LanguageData.AquacultureBasin.label: Cuenca de acuicultura
LanguageData.AquacultureBasin.description: Una cuenca diseñada para criar peces. La calidad del agua es auto-regulada. Es necesario proporcionar una regulación de la temperatura externa y algunos alimentos en la tolva adjunta para alimentar a los peces criados.
LanguageData.AquacultureBasin_Blueprint.label: Aquaculture basin (blueprint)
LanguageData.AquacultureBasin_Frame.label: Aquaculture basin (building)
LanguageData.AquacultureBasin_Frame.description: A basin designed to breed fishes. Water quality is auto-regulated. You need to provide an external temperature regulation and some food in attached hopper to feed the bred fishes.
